DOC.brief_summary: To compare the safety and efficacy of low-dose versus standard dose lopinavir/ritonavir containing HAART regimen in virological suppress, HIV RNA viral load < 50 copies/ml at 48 week
DOC.brief_title: Pediatric Study for Appropriate Dose of Ritonavir Boosted Lopinavir in Thai HIV-infected Children (PEARL)
DOC.criteria: 1. HIV infection children age < 18 years old 2. Currently on PI regimens 3. HIV RNA viral load < 50 copies/ml at screening 4. BW 2550 kg 5. Written informed consent 1. Relevant history or current condition of PI resistance, plasma HIV RNA > 1000 copies/ml after received the PI regimens for at least 6 months 2. On rifampin, nevirapine, efavirenz which have drug interaction with lopinavir 3. On double boosted protease inhibitors
